notes_v2.title: Avalon
notes_v2.text:
Rules:
1. Put your music library on shuffle.
2. For each question, press the next button to get your answer.
3. You must write that song title as the answer to the question, no matter how silly it sounds! Most of the time they seem to work though, strangely enough.
4. Ok, go!
5. When you're done, tag 20 people in this note, and make sure to tag the person who sent you this.

I'm not doing #5. Here are my answers:

1) IF SOMEONE SAYS "IS THIS OK?" YOU SAY?
C'est Si Bon (It's So Good)

2) WHAT WOULD BEST DESCRIBE YOUR PERSONALITY?
Diamonds & Gold

3) WHAT DO YOU LIKE IN A GUY/GIRL?
129

4)HOW DO YOU FEEL TODAY?
Goodbye Baby Goodbye

5) WHAT IS YOUR LIFE'S PURPOSE?
The Train Singer's Song

6) WHAT IS YOUR MOTTO?
Riding By

7) WHAT DO YOU THINK OF YOUR PARENTS?
Woh Hata Rahe Hain Pardah

8) WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT VERY OFTEN?
Pretty Girl

9) WHAT IS 2+2?
Sweet Sensation

10) WHAT DO YOU THINK OF YOUR BEST FRIEND?
Clint Eastwood

11) WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE PERSON YOU LIKE?
Blue Moon Waltz

12) WHAT IS YOUR LIFE STORY?
I'll Never Get Out Of This World Alive

13) WHAT DO YOU WANT TO BE WHEN YOU GROW UP?
Found a Job

14) WHAT DO YOU THINK WHEN YOU SEE THE PERSON YOU LIKE?
Black Wings

15) WHAT DO YOUR PARENTS THINK OF YOU?
Beautiful People

16) WHAT WILL YOU DANCE TO AT YOUR WEDDING?
Boats To Build

17) WHAT WILL THEY PLAY AT YOUR FUNERAL?
Northwest Passage

18) WHAT IS YOUR HOBBY/INTEREST?
La Vie En Rose

19) WHAT IS YOUR BIGGEST SECRET?
Denn Auch Sie Wissen Keine Antwort Darauf

20) WHAT DO YOU THINK OF YOUR FRIENDS?
I'll Sleep When I'm Dead

21) WHAT WILL YOU POST THIS AS?
Avalon

notes_v2.title: Earthquake!
notes_v2.text:
I just discovered these Facebook note thingies...

I was standing in the condo (29 floors up) and all of a sudden, things started to sway! Yes, an earthquake!

It was wild... my whole body was gently swaying for over a minute. Using the balcony as a reference, we could see how much the condo tower was swaying relative to the buildings below.

Magnitude 6.5 in Niigata prefecture (quite some distance from Osaka). It's been on the news for the past 15 minutes. Three houses destroyed (so far reported at least).
